After breakfast, we finished cleaning and I\nwaited for Inori outside of Tsubaki.%K%P
'I'm ready to go.'%K%P
'Wow, that outfit suits you well.'%K%P
'Y-You think so?'%K%P
Just like the first time I laid eyes on her-\nInori looked great in traditional Japanese-style\nclothes with her lustrous black hair.%K%P
'Thanks for changing into this.'%K%P
'Thank you for requesting it. Anyway, it's\nnothing, really.'%K%P
She's more than I deserve, she was the cutest\ngirlfriend.%K%P
'Now, shall we?'%K%P
'Yes!'%K%P
Inori walked right next to me.%K%P
Inori and I chatted while we walked through\nKannagi.%K%P
I've seen the many faces of Inori, and she\nseemed more cheerful now than ever before.%K%P
'You've changed, Inori.'%K%P
'Do you think so?'%K%P
'You've mellowed out since I met you. You seem\nmore content these days.'%K%P
In the beginning, Inori gave off this tense air.%K%P
But that tenseness had faded recently.%K%P
'Yes, you might be right. I think I may have\nbeen too fervent about work.%K%P
'But, since I started living at Tsubaki and\nspent more time with you guys, I realized that I\nshouldn't be so stiff.'%K%P
'While I do believe austerity is necessary as a\ngoddess, I didn't need to be like that all the\ntime.'%K%P
'I was able to realize that because of you guys.\nPlus, the townspeople have been talking to me\ntoo recently!'%K%P
'It makes me happy.'%K%P
Her genuine smile was very beautiful, making me\nfall in love with her all over again.%K%P
'I can't help it...'%K%P
'Help what?'%K%P
'I just love you, Inori.'%K%P
'What? Th-Thank you...'%K%P
Inori tilted her head and wondered why I said\nthat out of the blue.%K%P
I adored Inori very much.%K%P
We kept on walking and arrived at the park.%K%P
Since it was during the day, there was no sign\nof anyone else.%K%P
Taking a walk in the park on a weekday like this\nwas refreshing.%K%P
'It's so nice and quiet here.'%K%P
'Hmm...'%K%P
When I looked over, Inori was staring at me.%K%P
'Inori? Is there something on my face?'%K%P
'Hm? Are you the usual Sho?'%K%P
After she said that, she continued to stare.%K%P
'Hmm...'%K%P
Was she doing it unconsciously?%K%P
Why was she staring at me like that?%K%P
I continued to walk through the park, puzzled,\nand I noticed how Inori's hands were moving\nunnaturally.%K%P
Ah, I see what's going on.%K%P
'Excuse me.'%K%P
'Oh!'%K%P
I tightly wrapped Inori's hand around my vacant\nhand.%K%P
'I'm sorry it took so long for me to realize.'%K%P
'N-No! I'm just happy about the fact that you\neven realized it!'%K%P
Inori squeezed my hand back.%K%P
I was glad my intuition was right.%K%P
The warmth from her hand soothed me like no\nother, even if we were just holding hands.%K%P
'It's strange. We're just holding hands, but I\ncan sense your feelings and it makes me so\nhappy.%K%P
'Me too. I feel you close to me and it's makes\nmy heart beat faster.'%K%P
As we held each other's hands, we continued to\nwalk around the park.%K%P
We visited Inori's shrine after grocery shopping\nsince she wanted to.%K%P
'Over here, Sho.'%K%P
I followed her lead and sat at the open corridor\nof the main shrine.%K%P
'Please wait here for a moment.'%K%P
She then disappeared into the back of the main\nshrine.%K%P
While I waited for Inori, I looked around the\ngrounds.%K%P
'I confessed my love to Inori here.'%K%P
The memory was still vivid in my mind.%K%P
'Her lips were so soft.'%K%P
I smiled as I remembered the sensation of our\nkiss.%K%P
'Sorry to keep you waiting.'%K%P
I heard Inori's voice from behind.%K%P
'Welcome back. So, what was it that you wanted\nto do?'%K%P
'Heheh, actually, it's this.'%K%P
'Ear cleaning?'%K%P
'Yes. I always dreamed of cleaning my\nboyfriend's ears. But only if you'd like it...\nWhat do you think?'%K%P
'Of course. I would love that.'%K%P
'Heheh. Then please lay on your side.'%K%P
I laid my head on Inori's lap as I was told.%K%P
This was a first for me and it felt\nexceptionally good.%K%P
Especially...%K%P
'This view...'%K%P
As she leaned over to clean my ears, her chest\ngot closer to my face.%K%P
I only got tiny glimpse of them earlier, so now\nthat I got to see them up close, they were\nincredible.%K%P
'I'm going to start.'%K%P
'Please.'%K%P
Inori's hands touched my head and the ear pick\nentered my ears.%K%P
'Please tell me if it hurts.'%K%P
Inori's hands slowly started to move.%K%P
'Wow, this...'%K%P
I was a kid the last time someone else cleaned\nmy ears and it sure felt good!%K%P
'Inori, you're good at this.'%K%P
'Really? It makes me happy that you think that.'%K%P
As she smiled, her large chest swayed in the\ncorner of my view.%K%P
I couldn't get enough of it.%K%P
'I'm going to blow a little air, okay?'%K%P
Her breath tickled my ear and a tingling\nsensation went down my spine.%K%P
'Oh, I found a bigger one. There.'%K%P
Seeing Inori having so much fun cleaning my ears\nmade me happy.%K%P
'Does it feel good?'%K%P
'So good, that I want it to last forever.'%K%P
'Heheh, you're exaggerating. But, I'll be happy\nto do this for you whenever you'd like.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
I'm probably going to ask her to do it a lot.%K%P
'Of course. I'm your girlfriend.'%K%P
'That's why you're into doing the chores\nlately.'%K%P
'Y-Yes. Now that I'm your girlfriend, I\nt-thought I'd practice homemaking.'%K%P
Practice homemaking?%K%P
Inori was so dedicated, of course she already\nthought that far when we just got together.%K%P
'Um, does that bother you?'%K%P
'No way. It makes me so happy that you think of\nus so much.'%K%P
I also had no plans to break up with Inori.%K%P
That's why I had to do my best to keep her\ninterested as well.%K%P
'By the way, can a goddess have a child with a\nhuman?'%K%P
'There's no problem there. As we see in many\nlegends, goddesses can conceive children with\nhumans.'%K%P
'Plus, there are other goddesses out there whose\nlovers are human as well.'%K%P
'Huh, I see. So there are other couples like us\nout there.'%K%P
It's been years since goddesses started living\namong people, of course we weren't the first.%K%P
'Then, today's cooking was part of your\nhomemaking training.'%K%P
'Yes, but I'm still very far from Maika's\nlevel.'%K%P
'Maika is my childhood friend.'%K%P
'I know! And she's so knowledgeable about your\npreferences!'%K%P
'So I have to step it up!'%K%P
I see.%K%P
Maika was a mentor, and at the same time, a\nbarrier she wanted to overcome.%K%P
'I'm looking forward to it.'%K%P
'Yes! I'll learn all your likes and dislikes\nright away!'%K%P
'But before that, I must finish cleaning your\nears. They're still a bit stuffed up.'%K%P
She went back to ear cleaning and her chest came\neven closer.%K%P
Ah, I've finally found my paradise.%K%P
That's how I felt seeing Inori's chest sway back\nand forth.%K%P
The autumn breeze also felt good.%K%P
Experiencing the pleasure of getting my ears\ncleaned by Inori in the most comfortable weather\nmade my eyelids heavy.%K%P
'All done... Sho?'%K%P
'He fell asleep.'%K%P
I caressed Sho's head like a child in my lap.%K%P
'Love is such a strange thing.'%K%P
The more I learned about him, the more I spent\ntime with him, the more I loved him.%K%P
I never imagined to ever feel this way.%K%P
'I thought this earlier this morning too, but\nyou look like a child when you're asleep.'%K%P
I poked at his cheek.%K%P
It wasn't as soft as I was expecting. He was\nindeed no child.%K%P
I moved my finger and got to his lips.%K%P
'Oh yeah, this was where we had our first kiss.'%K%P
As I remembered our first kiss, I couldn't keep\nmy eyes off of Sho.%K%P
'Are you asleep?'%K%P
I spoke to him lightly and got no response.%K%P
'Sh-Sho. If you don't wake up, I'm gonna kiss\nyou?'%K%P
I purposely said to try and wake him up, but\nstill got no response.%K%P
'I'm really gonna kiss you.'%K%P
I let out a breath out of nervousness and kissed\nSho on his cheek while he was asleep.%K%P
I secretly kissed Sho.%K%P
I felt an inexplicable sense of immorality stir\nup inside me.%K%P
'No... That wasn't enough at all.'%K%P
I really wanted to kiss him on the lips, but\nthat would wake him up.%K%P
That's why I pecked at his cheek over and over\nagain.%K%P
'Muah... M-Muah, muah.'%K%P
I started to wake up when I felt something on my\ncheek and saw that Inori was kissing me.%K%P
'Inori?'%K%P
'Ah!'%K%P
When I called her, she reacted like a child who\ngot caught doing mischief.%K%P
'Sh-Sh-Sh-Sho?! S-S-ince when were you awake?!'%K%P
'Just now. Were you...just kissing me?'%K%P
'Ah, uh, yes.'%K%P
Her face turned bright red as her body curled\nup.%K%P
'I'm sorry...'%K%P
'No, no. I'm not mad.'%K%P
ã€€'I wasn't even awake, so now you have to kiss\nme again. Oh, and on the lips of course.'%K%P
'A-Ahh...'%K%P
Seeing Inori all nervous, coming to kiss me was\nso extremely satisfying.%K%P
